Text: much better than the Carrey one.

@MKVGuy Thank you very much for this and other uploads. I'm from Nepal and my internet download speed is around 10-15 so it's takes a lot of time to download a movie of more than 700 mb. So I'm really grateful to you. But I see that you have uploaded mostly recent movies but this one is a classic TV show. Could you upload some classic movies ? Movies from the IMDB top 250 list or the movies from AFI's 100 best movies ? I have a list of 100 best movies of the 20th century produced by Harvard University, if you want I can send a copy of it, or do you already have it ? You already have done good works and I feel I'm asking too much from you. Well once again THANK YOU MKVGuy :)
I made a mistake. My download speed is around 10-15 kbps and sometimes it decreases than that.
